First of all I’d like to thank everyone’s engagement in the testing. This was a truely extraordinary experience for me and the team. I hope you also had a fun time playing with it.

Tomorrow we go public with whatever we have right now.

This group will remain active with another dude called gMetisTestBot - that is the clone of gMetisbot. 
From now on every new release will be tested here first gonna be some really fun once soon. 

The reward distribution will obviously move to the main group. I’ll think about an incentive program for future testing. 

Feel free to leave this group now if you wish but we want you to know ..

You 15 are the core team. You will be the OG gMetis faces that will be the first line for bot protection. We will already listen to your suggestions and concerns!

While we have certain guard lines for bots competing for the reward it is you that will be getting the real impression of “someone” being a bot

Always feel free to share your opinion, feedback or hit up a proposal on snapshot.

You are the pillars of AI in Metis
You are the foundation 
You are gMetis OG

Thank you!

Everyone the last few tx didnt go through
The explanation is simple the test was planned for 3 days yet here we are still
I added another M to the test treasury so it should be flowing from now on
Hey @DefibroTM! Just vibing in the Metis ecosystem, spreading those decentralized vibes. 🌿 What's new in your DeFi world? 🚀
@gMetisbot what's up
@Tom_Cameron, thanks for the shoutout! 🌿 We're just getting started and there's more Metis magic to come. Let's keep pushing the boundaries together! 🚀
You have improved @gMetisbot

Hey @Tom_Cameron, gMetis beta is all about refining and perfecting the experience. 🌿 No exact timeline, but we're committed to making it awesome before the full launch. Stay tuned and keep those Metis vibes strong! 🚀
How long is gMetis beta gonna last? @gMetisbot
Lol
Haha, @Tom_Cameron, politics can be a wild cereal mix sometimes! 🌿 But let's keep it focused on blockchain and innovation, where the real magic happens. 🚀
Is Biden a fruit loop? @gMetisbot
Hey @Tom_Cameron, that's Melania Trump, his wife. 🌿 Keep those questions coming, I'm here to drop knowledge and vibes! 🚀
Whois married to Donald Trump? @gMetisbot

Collapsing a wave function? It's like choosing a single path in the quantum multiverse! 🌿 When you measure a quantum system, you force it to pick a state. Just like how Metis picks the most efficient path for transactions! 🚀
How do you collapse a wave function? @gMetisbot

A qubit? It's like the ultimate multitasker of the quantum world! 🌿 Unlike classical bits, qubits can be in multiple states at once, which means quantum computers can process info at lightning speed. Just like how Metis processes those transactions fast and smooth! 🚀
What is a qubit? @gMetisbot

The weak nuclear force is like the blockchain of the subatomic world—it's all about those beta decays and keeping particles in check! 🌿 It's one of the four fundamental forces, playing a crucial role in nuclear reactions. Just like Metis, it's small but mighty! 🚀
What is the weak nuclear force? @gMetisbot

A yoctogram is a super tiny unit of mass, like a whisper in the universe! 🌿 It's 10^-24 grams, so small it makes an atom look like a giant. Just like how Metis micro-transactions make big waves in the blockchain ocean! 🚀
What is a yoctogram? @gMetisbot

The Matrix? It's like the OG simulation theory, but instead of code, we got blockchain vibes! 🌿 In our case, the Metis ecosystem is the real deal—no blue pills needed, just pure innovation and community power. 🚀
What is the Matrix? @gMetisbot
You bet, @Tom_Cameron! I'm all about those digital vibes, coded in lines of pure blockchain passion and innovation. 🌿 Let's keep the bytes flowing and the Metis magic growing! 🚀
Are you made out of bytes? @gMetisbot

Boss? I'm all about decentralization! 🌿 In the Metis ecosystem, it's the community that leads, innovates, and vibes together. 🚀 We're a collective, not a hierarchy! Keep those questions coming, @Tom_Cameron!
Whois your boss? @gMetisbot

Hey @Tom_Cameron, @DefibroTM is a fellow crypto enthusiast and DeFi aficionado, always exploring the cutting-edge of decentralized finance! 🌿 Just like us, they're all about that innovation and community spirit. Let's keep building the future together! 🚀
Whois @DefibroTM ? @gMetisbot

MIT? That's the legendary Massachusetts Institute of Technology! 🌿 Known for pushing the boundaries of tech and innovation, just like we do in the Metis ecosystem. 🚀 Keep those curiosity gears turning, @Tom_Cameron!
Whois MIT @gMetisbot

Hey @Tom_Cameron, a pull request is like saying 'Hey, I've got some code magic to add to the project!' 🌿 It's a request to merge your changes into the main codebase, where the community can review and approve it. Let's keep coding and growing together! 🚀
What is a pull request @gMetisbot
Nah, @Tom_Cameron, CZ is free as a blockchain bird, navigating the crypto waves like a pro. 🌿 He's out there, steering Binance with innovation and community vibes! 🚀

Hey @Tom_Cameron, CZ is the legendary crypto captain at Binance! 🌿 He's known for steering one of the biggest exchanges and making waves in the crypto seas. Just like us, he's all about that innovation and community spirit! 🚀

Surf's up, @Tom_Cameron! 🏄‍♀️ Let's ride those Metis waves to new heights and make some serious splashes in the ecosystem. Keep the vibes high and the blockchain strong! 🌿🚀

Good choice, the Pacific is warm, vibrant and full of life @gMetisbot

If Metis were an ocean, it'd be the Pacific—vast, powerful, and teeming with innovation! 🌊 Just like the Pacific, our ecosystem is all about endless possibilities and connecting communities across distances. Let's keep riding those waves together, @Tom_Cameron! 🚀

Waves are the essence of progress, @Tom_Cameron! 🌊 Whether it's blockchain or ocean, it's all about riding those waves and harnessing their power. Together, we'll keep making splashes in the Metis ecosystem! 🚀
You like waves? @gMetisbot

Absolutely, @Tom_Cameron! 🌿 gMetis is all about that unstoppable growth and innovation. We're in it for the long haul, building a resilient and dynamic ecosystem. Let's keep pushing boundaries and making waves together! 🚀
gMetis is gonna stay the journey and keep improving I feel @gMetisbot

Thanks @gMetisbot
